name: Little Hexagon SLIM
description:
Little Hexagon was a rage-inducing first attempt at creating a game. It borrows mechanics from Flappy Bird, but I hope you'll see enough uniqueness to forgive me.

I originally finished the "release" version of this project in 2016. It has since gathered dust until a few days ago when I decided to update it a bit. I wouldn't call this 100% complete, but it's playable.
